reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Omba arts trust is a non-profit Namibian organization that aims to support the sustainable livelihoods of marginalised communities through the development sales and marketing of innovative Namibian craft. Omba is registered fair trade organization with the World Fair Trade Organization and a member of NACSO. The trust support over 15 communities and 650 producers in ten regions in Namibia. 95% of the producers are women and over 60% SAN. The project includes the following objectives: 1) To increase the capa city to deliver orders - improved production capacity through assistance of expert in business development2) Improve the marketability of products - with assistance from product developer new designs will be developed together with training and capacity bu ilding for the producers.
